message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're starting high, I'm willing to meet you halfway!
You're getting closer, but I'll still take a bit more!
You're pushing hard, I'm not backing down!
You're getting close, but I still want a better deal!
You're getting desperate, I'm not giving in!
I'm not giving up yet, let's try again!
You're running out of time, take it or leave it!
I'm not giving up, I'll try one more time!
Take it, or I'll take it all!
I'd rather have nothing than accept this unfair offer!
Fine, have it your way, but you're making a huge mistake!
I'm not going to accept an offer that gives me nothing, Bob!
